entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Invalid lowering for SELECT over mixed neg/not operands #87384
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Nullable<T> implement IEquatable<Nullable<T>> #87379
  • [API Proposal]: FMA for Vector2/3/4 specifically #87377

Closed

  • Strange behavior with multiline Regex #87368
  • Apt dependency `libnuma1` missing for Ubuntu 22.04 + amd64 #87225
    8.0.0
  • Regex engines only look for 'LF' line endings when using RegexOptions.Multiline mode as opposed to looking for 'CRLF' as well #66845
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 40 Regressions on 5/27/2023 12:14:23 AM #86902
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • enable disabled Quic tests #87385
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that types of ignored or inaccessible properties are not included by the source generator. #87383
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add a JsonConverter.Type property. #87382
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable GDV with multiple guesses for NativeAOT #87380
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up physical promotion heuristics #87376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on the simulator and maccatalyst on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT JIT-EE bug #87378
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize zero-byte receives on ManagedWebSocket #87329
    area-System.Net

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Repurpose Gen0ReductionCount field for dynamic heap count diagnostics. #87009
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose DOTNET_JitPrintInlinedMethods in Release #84606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Fix rooted connection when hanshake failed #87328
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Make virtual delegate targets less costly #87308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • WIP do more BGCs #87372
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2198211 #87296
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops for NonBacktracking engine #87369
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Prototype] Make idSmallCns signed on xarch #87373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix validation on build #87354
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fixes and improvements: #87218
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wip][nativeaot][tests] Add smoke runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS #87260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
